# Remove parentheses
<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->



Remove all parentheses including their content, e.g., transforms 'Berlin (City)' -> 'Berlin'.


## Parameter

`None`

## Advanced Parameter

`None`
